tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Neck Pain Treatment,Physiotherapy for Sports Injury Rehabilitation,Muscle release,
review:
Accurate diagnosis,
I was suffering from acute pain in my neck and shoulders  from past one month, problem was  left undiagnosed even after MRI‚Äôs and so many different test suggested by previous doctor which was actualIy creating a sense of anxiety with ongoing painful problem.
I contacted  Dr. Shah around a week back, after reading reviews  and his specialization like any other person will do and its totally worth it üåü.
My Problem got diagnosed properly and appropriate therapy was suggested and i have started feeling improvement in the pain from second day only.
His approach towards his patient is very positive and also gives flexible options to approach in case of emergency.
Highly recommendedüåüüåüüåüüåüüåü.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr. Sourabh to consult for my wife's back pain issue which she was having for past couple of months. Dr. Sourabh was very friendly and calm to explain each and everything to us and he listened to the issue with total calmness. would definitely recommend to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor explained the problems very well  and also patiently listened to all my problems. I was suffering with severe knee pain over the last few months and after taking medicines prescribed by him , I have completely recovered. Also I have visited him again form my muscle pain in legs and hope to recover from this too very soon. Thanks Doctor!!

Dr. Sourabh Shah is one of the most helpful doctors we have come across.  He treated my sister who is an appert syndrome child - she had frature in 2020 and was also diagonased of severe Osteoporosis. Thanks to Dr. Sourabh Shah's personal attention and  recommend treatment we have seen a remarkable improvement, she is now able to stand and walk with some help. I am confident that with this ongoing treatment she will be able to walk on her own again.

I ve booked an appointment with Dr. Shah which was confirmed by doctor clinic, even called half an hour before visiting. To my surprise when I reached the clinic, after making me wait for 10-15 mins, I ve been informed that doctor is not available and has been to some other location. on my further questions, they informed that "doctor sir bol ke gye they aa rhe hai, ab vo chale gye toh hum kya hi kr skte hai". A pathetic response.

Dr Saurabh Sah have experience how to tackle patients of all ages.He treating my child RIDDHIMA SINGH very well .He always giving reply of my quiry regarding my child treatment in off duty time also. During carona time he was alWays available on WhatsApp for advise medicine and give consult.**** ** ******* ** ** *  **** *******

Dr. Sourabh is very friendly and helpful. It's been very nice experience with him. He listen to the problems which one is facing, understand it and act accordingly. 
So overall experience is excellent üëçüôÇ will definitely recommend to others.
Friendly doctor and very helpful. Explained the issue very well and was very encouraging. I had only chosen to meet him as he looked pleasant in his profile pic but I'm happy my intuition worked.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would like to call out for Dr Saurabh, his experience in his domain and the way he address the issue,  that‚Äôs incredible. Half of your disease will went way when you just spoke with him.

It was a pleasant experience for me.

Different members of my family including myself  have been Dr Saurabh Shah's patient for last some years. His diagnosis and treatment is good . He is polite and listens to patient's concerns and problems.
